Review.Contenu: Dispute reasons aren't unique there's same dispute reasons list to choose that's why I hardly to get my results always remain same. They need to add lot of it to get negatives deleted.

I use DisputeBee when sending dispute to the Credit Bureaus, which is very helpful for me, but I do wish it would change up sometime for the money we pay monthly. Please consider changing the disputes to the Bureaus. Thanks.
It's pretty good, I would like to improve the communication with customer service.  A live phone person would be great!

Review.Titre: My credit score has already moved up by…
Review.Contenu: My credit score has already moved up by 26 points

Review.Titre: I like doing things myself.  I have always monitored my credit…
Review.Contenu: I have always monitored my credit report.  And in the past I have tried to handle it myself because frankly I don't want to pay someone to help if I can do it myself.  After reviewing DisputeBee with a few dollars a month (less than experian) seeing tutorials, easy steps to complete.  I decided this was the software for me.

Easy set up breaks down every process and guides you through the disputing process generates the letters gives you address where to send them and gives you a time frame on when to check back I been looking for 609 letters for the longest thank you! Wish me luck!

Review.Titre: They have a management system for both…
Review.Contenu: They have a management system for both individual and professional credit repair agents. Pay monthly and they show you how to write letters for disputes. Auto generated templates. Ideal for people who are hands on and want to know exactly what is happening with the dispute themselves. Takes several rounds to delete dispute but you have total control over it because you are the one who handle mailing letters. The templates are of perfect native English so they are good qualities. They even refunded me immediately when I wanted to quit! Five star trustworthy customer service.

Review.Titre: I like how organize they are and how…
Review.Contenu: I like how organize they are and how they generate the letters after each response.  So, the next step I’m waiting on is to respond to move on to the next step but other than that I’m please so far.

Review.Titre: My credit score went from 500 to 782…
Review.Contenu: My credit score went from 500 to 782 the highest it’s ever been! Can’t thank DisputeBee enough 🙏 I’m so happy and thankful I’ve been able to secure 25k credit cards limits and endless low % rates for my new car loans. Saving me thousands - I feel free each month paying low payments because I have a low interest rate. Im able to pay more into my loans and this is reflecting on my credit as well. The program is super simple to use and after a few rounds of letters you’ll see things fall off. It’s amazing and some are persistent and I’m still working on some but only have 5 negative accounts left, out of 38 negative accounts. Seems like a lot but my credit was a mess before and now I’m understanding the ripple effect of just one late payment. And then an entire account closed out adds even more to those late payments now you have collections after that so my sitch was pretty messy. All and all I will say the price for the program and then the add on with the credit report is worth it. I was able to see my score increase and I controlled how fast I wanted to get my score repaired. Total time I’ve spent using the program is about 9 months. I’m thankful now I can have the score I wanted after all the mess I’ve been through. Thank you DisputeBee
